articles.title: Aussies Are Offering Their Advice To Non-Australians About How To Deal With Extreme Heat
articles.description: "Heed this advice — I moved to Australia from Wales when I was four and nearly died of heatstroke within a week."
articles.content:
"If you get a headache, become irritable or notice that your heart is racing, drink something cool and if you can, take a cool shower or bath, you may be experiencing heatstroke."
